channel.title: What would happen to the runescape private server community if
channel.description:
what would happen to the runescape private server community if.... a fully intergrated runescape remake was released with nothing missing and it was so simple to run even a noob could click one button and run/install it.
Tell me.

item.title: What would happen to the runescape private server community if
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

Rodgerwilco:

At the same time content is some what of a bitch to implement without the correct architecture, look at where we are after 8-9 years?

See: Article I wrote about this

Read full topic

item.title: What would happen to the runescape private server community if

@sinisoul wrote:

Funnily enough the most popular RSPS sources are either the ones that already have a lot of built in support or that fall in this category.

item.title: What would happen to the runescape private server community if
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

[quote=“icexpanda, post:5, topic:549935”][quote author=Eyeownyew link=topic=668814.msg4472793#msg4472793 date=1424057332]

i think he means actual runescape not nostalgia runescape
[/quote]

i mean 2007 runescape, that runescape gives me nostalgia…[/quote]

You would expect a different result?

Read full topic
